participant_1.name: Isabella Torres
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate, she enjoys exploring different cultures and is open-minded.
participant_1.background: i'm a descendant of christopher columbus. i love to cook paella. i'm an art major in college. i visit europe twice a year.

participant_2.name: Ethan Walker
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and introspective, he values nature and enjoys sharing his experiences with others.
participant_2.background: my parents taught me survival skills. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. i'm an avid kayaker. i walk dogs for a living.
